scripts.lint: npm run frontend:lint && npm run backend:lint
scripts.format: cargo fmt --all && cd frontend && npm run format
scripts.check: npm run frontend:check && npm run backend:check
scripts.dev: export VIBE_ASSETS_DIR=$(pwd)/dev_assets && export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "npm run backend:dev:watch" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.dev:network: NETWORK_HOST=$(node scripts/get-network-host.js) && export VIBE_ASSETS_DIR=$(pwd)/dev_assets && export HOST=0.0.0.0 && export VITE_HOST=0.0.0.0 && export VITE_HMR_HOST=$NETWORK_HOST && export BACKEND_HOST=$NETWORK_HOST && export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "npm run backend:dev:watch" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:dev: BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) npm run backend:dev:watch
